name: Wrackwraith
description: The Wrackwraith is a medium-sized undead creature known for its ghostly form and ability to animate debris.
memorable: It can animate piles of debris, providing it both offensive and defensive capabilities.
goals: To engage foes in combat while manipulating its environment for strategic advantage.
relations: Often encountered near ruins or battlefields, typically where debris is abundant.
environment: Can usually be found in desolate areas or locations with remnants of past conflicts.
strengths: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage and several conditions makes it a tough opponent.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to force damage when it ends its turn inside objects.
attacks: Utilizes Ghostly Touch for necrotic damage and can grapple with its Slam attack.
most_powerful_ability: Deluge: a powerful attack that can choke and harm grappling targets.
senses: It has a passive perception of 13.
additional_information: Possesses Incorporeal Movement to move through objects.
Can utilize Wrack Jump to teleport between debris.
While in Wrack Form, increases its Armor Class to 18.
Can animate debris to provide it with a protective covering.
Resistant to multiple damage types including acid and fire.
test_queries: undead ghost creature that manipulates debris
ghostly creature able to animate wreckage
evasive undead that can choke enemies
